name: Rainy Season (itch)
description:
Pitch

You are a little frog, and it's going to rain soon ! You have 90 secondes to catch and eat as many bugs as possible, before the rain ends !

Playable as a lone frog, or as a 2-frogs competition !

Controls

Player 1. Jump : W, Z or Space. Tongue : X

Player 2. Jump : J, U or I. Tongue : M, K or ,

Graphics

The graphics are 2-bit, and sprites are 8*8 pixels, to recreate a game-boy style game. Every game uses a different color palette, found on Lospec. The name and maker of the current palette can be found on the bottom left of the screen.

Game Jam

This was made for the Mini Jam 106. The theme was Frogs, and the limitation was Limited time. I incorporated the limitation in two ways : first each game is in exactly 90 seconds, after which it ends, the player must then be as effective as possible in this amount of time. The second is the jumping mecanic : the jump target is constantly moving, thus the player has a limited time window to jump towards the direction they want to go to !

The game was made on Unity. The sprites were drawn on Aseprite, using Lospec color palettes. The sounds were built made on Reaper using the Soundly library, and integrated through FMOD into Unity.

Thanks for playing !
